original: Akusalaṁ saṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: akusalam saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naabyākato naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
analyzed: abyākatam a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā na abyākataḥ na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā

original: nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesika

original: dhammaṁ paccayā naakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammam paccayā na akusalaḥ na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
analyzed: abyākatam asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā na kusalaḥ na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesiko

original: ca naabyākato naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ
analyzed: ca na abyākataḥ na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā abyākata

original: asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naabyākato
analyzed: a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesikam dhammam paccayā na akusalaḥ na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesiko ca na abyākataḥ

original: naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesikaṁ
analyzed: na asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā abyākatam asaṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesika

original: dhammaṁ paccayā nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko ca naakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhasaṅkilesiko
analyzed: dhammam paccayā na kusalaḥ na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesiko ca na akusalaḥ na a saṅkiliṭṭha saṅkilesiko

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha …pe… āsevane
analyzed: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha ārammaṇe cha pe āsevane
pañca pe vipāke tīṇi avigate cha

original: Kusalaṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: kusalam asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Abyākataṁ asaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naasaṅkiliṭṭhaasaṅkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikam dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na asaṅkiliṭṭha asaṅkilesikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha adhipatiyā cha pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cha
